thread.title: Shauntelle Chevalier
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Shauntelle Chevalier

author: Shauntelle Chevalier
title: Shauntelle Chevalier
text: BEST NEW FURNITURE IN SATX! Huge warehouse FULL of every showroom and designer furniture SETS available at a fraction of the cost than anywhere else and the customer service is PHENOMENAL (I highly recommend Tristan Graham-he found eveything I needed)! THE place to go if you want to decorate your home with style,comfort and luxury WITHOUT the hefty mark-up of designer showrooms or getting robbed by paying twice the amount in Interest for pre-used, cleaned, furniture in a rent-to-own, bargain store! SO glad I found this place for staging apartments and I WILL be buying for my own home! THANK YOU FOR BRINGING THIS STORE TO SAN ANTONIO!
